00027 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00028 
00029     using std::runtime_error;
00030     using std::invalid_argument;
00031     
00037     struct PGMFile {
00038         enum Type { P2, P5 } type;
00039         
00041         std::string comment;
00042         
00043         int maxVal,width,height;
00044         DMatrix<int> buffer;
00045         
00047         PGMFile(const std::string&file) throw(runtime_error) {
00048             load(file);
00049         }
00050         
00051         PGMFile();
00052         
00053         void load(std::istream&is) throw(runtime_error);
00054         void load(const std::string&file) throw(runtime_error);
00055         bool load_(const std::string&file);
00056 
00057         /* Returns a viewport for the image. If meters_per_pixel==0 , it tries
00058         to parse "mapResolution XXX" from the comment. */
00059         RDK2::Geometry::Viewport getViewport(double meters_per_pixel=0) 
00060             throw (runtime_error, invalid_argument);
00061         
00062         bool readResolution(double&);
00063         
00064     };
